name: Vista Golf
summary:
Vista Golf is a simple but elegant mini golf game, defined by crisp controls and the endless competition of new courses every week. We wanted to create the purest form of mini golf in your pocket, so if you seek both fun and frustration, Vista Golf is your game.
Infinite Mode: Relax and play as far as you'd like on our endless course.
Weekly Mode: Each week, compete for the top spot across three 9-hole courses. At the end of each week, three leaders are crowned, and three new courses will open.
Daily Mode: Every day, compete on a new super-challenging 3-hole course.
